data.message: facebook why do you keep locking and blocking fb accts? you blocked mine saying i had to send a photo to prove i was over 13 years old???? after all these years????? tons of other people also getting blocked and locked..... 2 weeks ago you locked me because "I was commenting too fast"?????? what even is that?

replies.message: Hi Kate. You can learn more about confirming your identity with Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2erLZI2. Also, here are possible reasons why we may disable an account: http://bit.ly/2efP2rp. -Jessica
